channel.title: Recipe on Site In Progress
channel.description: Recent content in Recipe on Site In Progress

item.title: Teriyaki Tofu Stir Fry
item.description: This recipe makes 4 servings. Ingredients 28oz Firm Tofu 1 tbsp cornstarch 2 cups Sliced Carrots 1lb Broccoli 1/2 yellow onion For Sauce: 1/2 cup Soy Sauce 1/2 cup water 2 tbsp Brown Sugar 1/2 tbsp cornstarch Steps Press Tofu to remove excess moisture. Mix corn starch and bake until crispy. Stir fry veggies in a pan, then add in tofu and sauce. Enjoy :) Macros for 4 Servings Protein: 31g Carbs: 36g Fat: 12g Total Calories: 372

item.title: Cottage Cheesy Turkey Kale Mix
item.description: This recipe makes 4 servings. Ingredients 1 pound Ground Turkey 2 cups Cottage Cheese, 4% fat 2 cups kale, raw 1 tbsp taco seasoning Steps Brown the ground turkey, mixing in the taco seasoning while it is cooking with a small amount of oil. Once the ground turkey is cooked, add in all of the cottage cheese and mix. Simmer on medium-low heat, stirring every once and a while to make sure nothing is sticking and everything is incorporated.
